data.scheme_name: Uttar Pradesh Warehousing and Logistics Policy 2022 - Truckers Park - New
data.benefits: Scheme provides 100% exemption of Stamp duty, 75% of the Land use conversion charges shall be waived off, 75% of the Development Charges for Truckers Parks.
data.eligibility: All new units who wants to setup Trucker Park project are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions: Eligible Trucker Park project means any truck lay bays and parking cum resting space developed over atleast 10 acres of land in the State within a distance upto 2kms on either side of any national highway.EIP (Eligibility Investment Period) starts from the first investment date within the effective period and lasts up to 5 years or until commercial operations begin, whichever is earlier.Eligible Capital Investment refers to capital investment made during the eligible investment period. If investment starts before the effective date, at least 80% must be made after the effective date for it to be considered eligible for incentives.Applicant need to submit a Bank Guarantee, released after commercial operations begin.Exemptions and concessions will be provided only after verifying the unique ID issued by the Nodal Agency.
data.beneficiaries: All new units who wants to setup Trucker Park project are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites: Eligible Trucker Park project means any truck lay bays and parking cum resting space developed over atleast 10 acres of land in the State within a distance upto 2kms on either side of any national highway.EIP (Eligibility Investment Period) starts from the first investment date within the effective period and lasts up to 5 years or until commercial operations begin, whichever is earlier.Eligible Capital Investment refers to capital investment made during the eligible investment period. If investment starts before the effective date, at least 80% must be made after the effective date for it to be considered eligible for incentives.Applicant need to submit a Bank Guarantee, released after commercial operations begin.Exemptions and concessions will be provided only after verifying the unique ID issued by the Nodal Agency.
data.nodal_agency: Uttar Pradesh State Industrial Development Authority (UPSIDA)
data.context: Logistics is crucial in the global economy as it facilitates the exchange of goods and services for money through trade. This industry not only fosters economic growth but also addresses environmental and social concerns.
data.objective: The UP Government aims to enhance warehousing and logistics infrastructure, encourage private investment, create jobs, and adopt smart logistics methods through a new policy.
data.description: Scheme provides various incentives for Truckers Parks:100% Stamp Duty Exemption on land purchase or allotment75% Waiver on Land Use Conversion Charges75% Exemption on Development Charges.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can register themselves to the given following link: https://niveshmitra.up.nic.in/Default.aspx
data.funding_facilitator: Uttar Pradesh State Industrial Development Authority (UPSIDA)
data.funding_mechanism: The exemptions/concessions shall be provided by the relevant department only on verification of the unique ID issued by the Nodal Agency and will communicate the details to the Nodal Agency.
data.checklist_info_a:
Project Proposal/Business Plan
Proof of Land Ownership or Lease Agreement
Company Registration Documents
PAN Card and GST Registration
Bank Guarantee (if required for exemptions)
Environmental Clearance (if applicable)
Affidavit or Undertaking for Project Commitment
Financial Statements (Balance Sheets, Profit & Loss)
Proof of Eligibility for Incentives (e.g., investment details)
Proof of Compliance with Local Authority Regulations
Approvals from Industrial/Development Authorities (if applicable)
